entry.title: sadaigm/ai-as-agent: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
entry.content: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.

entry.title: RohitM-IN/SQLParser: `sqlparser-devexpress` is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL `WHERE` clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.
entry.content: `sqlparser-devexpress` is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL `WHERE` clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.

entry.title: Kei-K23/tryflow: Tryflow is a lightweight, production-ready utility for handling try-catch-finally blocks in JavaScript/TypeScript.
